parseChatBotResponse
Add Detail
func:
var chatbot     = msg.chatbot_response,
    req_body    = msg.req_body,
    userObj     = msg.userObj ,
    task_ids    = msg.task_ids;

msg.payload = {
  "table": "details",
  "task_id": flatten(["18_0", task_ids]),
  "child_task_id": null,
  "user_id": userObj._id,
  "from_user_id": req_body.chatbot_user,
  "page_id": 26,
  "from_page_id": 0,
  "to_page_id": 0,
  "synchronized": 0,
  "processed": 1,
  "status": 2,
  "read": 0,
  "display_if_empty": "true",
  "date_created": new Date().toJSON(),
  "offline_expiration_seconds": 0,
  "priority": 1,
  "category": "message",
  "type": {
      "public": "public",
      "company_bot_detail": "company_bot_detail"
    },
  "image": "",
    "from_user": {},
    "user_incoming": {
        "note":  (userObj.firstname + userObj.lastname),
        "message": req_body.body
    },
  "template": {},
  "timeout": {},
  "user_calculate": {},
  "location": {},
  "default": {},
  "count_status": {},
  "count": {},
  "count_if": {},
  "createdAt": new Date().getTime() 
};

msg.watson_output = {
    "table": "details",
    "task_id": flatten(["18_0", task_ids]),
    "child_task_id": null,
    "user_id": userObj._id,
    "from_user_id": req_body.chatbot_user,
    "page_id": 18,
    "from_page_id": 0,
    "to_page_id": 0,
    "synchronized": 0,
    "processed": 0,
    "status": 0,
    "read": 0,
    "display_if_empty": "true",
    "date_created": new Date().toJSON(),
    "offline_expiration_seconds": 0,
    "priority": 1,
    "category": "message",
    "type": {
      "public": "public"
    },
    "image": "",
    "from_user": {},
    "user_incoming": {
        "note":  (userObj.firstname + userObj.lastname),
        "message": chatbot.data || "Watson Stumped",
        "watson" : (chatbot.data == "Watson Stumped" ? null : chatbot.data) , 
    },
    "template": {},
    "timeout": {},
    "user_calculate": {},
    "location": {},
    "default": {},
    "count_status": {},
    "count": {},
    "count_if": {},
    "createdAt": new Date().getTime() + 20000 
};
node.warn("msg>>>>>>");
node.warn(msg);
return msg;


function flatten(arr) {
  const flat = [].concat(...arr);
  return flat.some(Array.isArray) ? flatten(flat) : flat;
}
